entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
